inference:
The area of the trapezoid is:

$$A = \frac{1}{2} \times (b_1 + b_2) \times h$$ 

$$A = \frac{1}{2} \times (5 cm + 9 cm) \times 3 cm$$ 

$$A = \frac{1}{2} \times 14 cm \times 3 cm$$ 

$$A = 21 cm^2$$

Final Answer: \boxed{21}. I hope it is correct.
